= name( arg1, ..., argN ) =

Checks if any of the supplied arguments are contained within the item's name


== Arguments ==

  * arg1...N = string(s) to search for

== Remarks ==
  * [RuleFunction_StringMatching string patterns] can be used

== Examples ==

`name( elixir, potion )`

`name( scroll of )`

= 3.2.35 Beta changes =

= name( "arg1", ..., "argN" ) =

Checks if any of the supplied arguments are contained within the item's name


== Arguments ==

  * "arg1...N" = string(s) to search for, must be quoted

== Examples ==

`name( "elixir", "potion" )`

`name( "scroll of" )`
